items.checkin_comment: Random pils, startup from Antalya. Manufacturers main focus is wine based aromatic drinks, I guess.

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 45 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 10!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 15 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 4!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 15 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 4!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 25 distinct venues!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 25 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 6!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 15 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 4!

items.checkin_comment: Smooth and nice. Ok pilsner for an everyday drink.
